EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations on funding with us! We would love your feedback.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Rapid Advance
HOME BLOG OUR SOLUTIONS
We Want To Hear From You!
Congratulations on your first funding with RapidAdvance! As our valued partner, we want to know how we can make your experience better. Please fill out Partner Survey to let us know how we can improve. It takes less than 5 minutes and your feedback will help us better serve you AND your client. Thanks again for being a RapidAdvance Partner!
